properties.name: status
properties.description: it is the status of order such as Draft, InProgress, Completed, CompletedWithFailure, Failed, Cancelled, PartiallyCancelled

properties.name: paymentState
properties.description: The payment state of the order such as Pending, PartiallyPaid, FullyPaid, PendingRefund, PartiallyRefunded, FullyRefunded

properties.name: source
properties.description: The source from which order was created such as ORXe2, ORXe3, MAUI, CAPI, LG, External

properties.name: displayPrice
properties.description: Contains the displayPrice object from the order creation request

properties.name: lastUpdatedBy
properties.description: AccountId of user who recently updated order

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of person like creator,customer and consumer

properties.name: ageGroupType
properties.description: ageGroupType of person like Adult, Child

properties.name: phoneType
properties.description: type of phone like unknown | mobile | work| home | fax

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of phone such as primary | secondary

addSchema.Name: costAdjustment
addSchema.Description: Cost adjustments like Fees, Offers and any other Adjustments

properties.name: subType
properties.description: subType of Fee/Offer/Adjustment - OrderLevelFee, PromoCode, FeeWaiver etc.

properties.name: operationType
properties.description: Debit or Credit from a customer stand-point

properties.name: cash
properties.description: cash amount of fee,offer and adjustment

properties.name: collectedBy
properties.description: collected from such as Client | Agency | Customer

properties.name: offerId
properties.description: Offer Id in case cost adjustment is of type offer/promo

properties.name: name
properties.description: Offer name in case cost adjustment is of type offer/promo

properties.name: offerType
properties.description: Offer type to indicate if offer is applied or order/component

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency of cash component included in offer

properties.name: pointsCurrency
properties.description: Currency of points component included in offer

properties.name: currencyCostFactor
properties.description: Currency cost factor to convert points to its equivalent cash amount

properties.name: pointsBreakup
properties.description: Contains pointsBreakup of consuming points with different currencyCostFactor

properties.name: pointsCashEquivalent
properties.description: Contains cash equivalent of points being consumed

properties.name: createdBy
properties.description: id/code of the user who created the code

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of notes such as :- System | Agent | Customer

properties.name: productOrderId
properties.description: NextGen product order id  received from the products

properties.name: productItemId
properties.description: NextGen item id provided by the product engines

properties.name: type
properties.description: it is the type of item such as Hotel, Car, Flight, Activity, Insurance, Cruise and Tour

properties.name: status
properties.description: status of item such as Pending, Completed, Failed, Cancelled

properties.name: addOnProductItemIds
properties.description: list ids of addonitems(like insurance etc)

properties.name: cancelledBy
properties.description: AccountId of user who cancelled order

properties.name: cancelledOn
properties.description: The DateTime at which the Cancellation operation was performed

properties.name: lastUpdatedBy
properties.description: AccountId of user who recently updated order

properties.name: cashCurrency
properties.description: earnings cash/amount Currency like a USD

properties.name: pointsCurrency
properties.description: earnings points currency like a point, miles

properties.name: pointsBreakup
properties.description: Contains pointsBreakup of consuming points with different currencyCostFactor

properties.name: pointsCashEquivalent
properties.description: Contains cash equivalent of points being consumed

properties.name: paymentMode
properties.description: mode of payment to the supplier such as Deposit | VirtualCard | CustomerCard

properties.name: price
properties.description: the price breakup received by the supplier

properties.name: trackingId
properties.description: it is a confirmation number | SPNR

properties.name: travelPlanLocator
properties.description: travel plan locator for chase | tripId

properties.name: paymentId
properties.description: paymentId returned by the payment service

properties.name: confirmationNumbers
properties.description: confirmation or cancellation numbers from products

properties.name: travcomInvoiceNumbers
properties.description: shell invoice numbers generated in travcomm

properties.name: customFields
properties.description: list of key value pair of different client details

properties.name: type
properties.description: type can be vendor or supplier

properties.name: for
properties.description: it will be either cancellation or confirmation

addSchema.name: cancellationCost
addSchema.description: Break-up of waivers provided by an Agent associate with cancellation and non-refundable penalties and charges

properties.name: cancellationCostType
properties.description: type of cancellation cost waiver or deduction

properties.name: cash
properties.description: amount to be waived off or deduct

properties.name: points
properties.description: points to be waived off or deduct

properties.name: pointsCurrency
properties.description: points currency like a point, miles

properties.name: currencyCostFactor
properties.description: Currency cost factor to convert points to its equivalent cash amount

properties.name: pointsBreakup
properties.description: Contains pointsBreakup of consuming points with different currencyCostFactor

properties.name: pointsCashEquivalent
properties.description: Contains cash equivalent of points being consumed

properties.name: source
properties.description: Name of the service which have has returned error

addRelation.name: orderCostAdjustment
addRelation.description: Order may have multiple order level adjustments - fees, offers and adjustments

addRelation.name: itemCostAdjustment
addRelation.description: Order may have multiple Item level adjustments - fees, offers and adjustments
